io.cettia

Interface ServerSocket.Reply<T>

  • Enclosing interface:
    ServerSocket

    public static interface ServerSocket.Reply<T>
    Interface to deal with reply.

    For the allowed types for T, see ServerSocket.on(String, Action).

    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
